description.en: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Black. Lasts 7 days.
description.ar: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Black. Lasts 7 days.
description.br: Esta mística orbe irá mudar a cor da aura da sua armadura fortalecida para a cor Preta. Dura 7 dias.
description.cns: 这个神秘的球体会将你升级后的盔甲光效的颜色更改为黑色。持续7天。
description.de: Ändert die existierende Aura aufgewerteter Rüstungssets in die Farbe Schwarz.
description.fi: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Black. Lasts 7 days.
description.fil: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Black. Lasts 7 days.
description.fr: Votre armure enchantée émet une aura noire pendant 7 jours.
description.id: Bola mistis ini akan mengubah warna aura armor yang kamu upgrade menjadi Black. Berlangsung selama 7 hari.
description.it: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Black. Lasts 7 days.
description.jp: 防具の精錬エフェクトを黒色に変化させることのできる期間制アイテム
description.kr: 이 신비로운 아이템은 업그레이드된 갑옷의 아우라 색상을 검은색으로 바꿉니다. 7일간 지속됩니다.
description.nl: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Black. Lasts 7 days.
description.pl: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Black. Lasts 7 days.
description.ru: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Black. Lasts 7 days.
description.sp: Este orbe místico cambiará el color del aura de tu armadura mejorada a Negro. Dura 7 días.
description.sw: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Black. Lasts 7 days.
description.th: ลูกแก้วลึกลับนี้จะเปลี่ยนสีของออร่าของเกราะที่อัพเกรดเป็นสีดำ ใช้เวลา 7 วัน
description.tw: 將防具精鍊效果變成黑色，持續7天。
description.vi: Quả cầu thần bí này sẽ thay đổi màu hào quang của áo giáp nâng cấp của bạn thành Đen. Kéo dài 7 ngày.
